name: Challenge of the Lizards
description:
Lenin Grossekomodowaran, the albino Komodo dragon, is the protagonist of this minigame (1% of the actual game). Basically, the monitor lizard is gonna explode the crap outta the (numerous) enemies and devour a huge cheeseburger to complete each level.

While each kill rewards Lenin with 500 points, each cheeseburger rewards him with 100000 points at the end of the level.

Let's us make the enemies Wilhelm Scream!

Note: use a joystick to play.
